pageContext.pigments_costume: Doublet: carbon-based black, lead white, indigo; red detail: red lead, red lake; ruff: lead white (lead white and carbon-based black for grey shading)

pageContext.pigments_hair_and_beard: Carbon-based black, red lead, hematite, indigo, lead white (?)
